methods.name: getDevice
methods.description:
The new values for the device registry. The id and num_id fields must be empty, and the field name must specify the name path. For example, projects/p0/locations/us-central1/registries/registry0/devices/device0or projects/p0/locations/us-central1/registries/registry0/devices/{num_id}.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.iot.v1.Device device = 2;

methods.name: getUpdateMask
methods.description:
Only updates the device fields indicated by this mask.

The field mask must not be empty, and it must not contain fields that are immutable or only set by the server. Mutable top-level fields: credentials, blocked, and metadata

Generated from protobuf field .google.protobuf.FieldMask update_mask = 3;
